long_description: With a Shimano 105 drivetrain, butted aluminum frame and carbon fiber fork, our Novara Strada(R) road bike is a swift, smooth performer for fitness rides, club rides and centuries. Butted aluminum frame features shaped seatstays and top tube for enhanced comfort and performance; flat weld head tube improves strength and handling precision. Fork boasts a tapered alloy steerer with a machined, 1-piece alloy crown for strength and stiffness where it counts; carbon legs help damp road vibrations and reduce weight. Shimano 105 shifters and derailleurs offer high-end shifting performance and dependability without an astronomical price tag. Compact crankset and wide-ranging 12-30 cassette deliver the gearing versatility of a triple crankset without the weight or finicky shifting. Compact crankset is mechanically simpler and more reliable than a triple crankset; and it delivers virtually the same gearing. Shimano long-reach caliper brakes are compatible with fenders (not included) and deliver dependable braking power. Sturdy Weinmann rims, dependable Novatech hubs and Clement Strada LGG tires provide smooth-rolling performance. Eyelets for fenders let you outfit the Strada for wet-weather or commuting (not included). Replaceable rear derailleur hanger helps extend the usable life of the frame. Specs on our Novara Strada road bike are subject to change.
